question: A friend who lives in another country has invited you to come and stay with him on your next holiday. You are too busy to accept the invitation. Write a letter to your friend. In your letter:Thank him for the invitationExplain why you cannot comeAsk him about other times to visit
text: I am writing to thank you for your invitation. It's very kind of you but unfortunately I won’t be able to visit you this summer due to my hectic work schedule.

Let me explain my situation in detail. I’ve recently been promoted to teach the higher classes and though I am thoroughly enjoying my job, it has been extremely hard to cope with and manage the deadlines. I am in no position to ask the management for a holiday as it was me who was after them to promote me. Also, during summer I have to undergo a teacher's development programme. It has been made mandatory by the school authorities. The programme focuses on the different skills and teaching strategies that need to be implemented to bring about a fruitful teaching and learning experience for the students.

Could you inform me of another time you will be free? I’m excited to visit you. I was looking forward to staying at your new place and spending some quality time with your wife and children. I can travel to your place during the Christmas holidays and we can celebrate Christmas and ring in the new year together. Let me know if you are available.
I look forward to hearing from you.

error_list.error_des: It appears that you are missing a comma after the introductory phrase unfortunately. Consider adding a comma.
